price: He said, “Do you know what you did to Joseph and his brother when you were ignorant[35]?”
arabic: قَالَ هَلۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا فَعَلۡتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ جَٰهِلُونَ
footnotes: [35] He provided them with a face-saving excuse by saying that they were ignorant for what they did.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: qāla hal ʿalim'tum mā faʿaltum biyūsufa wa-akhīhi idh antum jāhilūna
